author: Reuters Editorial
title: Shenzhen Sunwin Intelligent says dividend payment date on May 10
text:
May 3 (Reuters) - Shenzhen Sunwin Intelligent Co Ltd
* Says it will pay a cash dividend of 0.5 yuan (before tax) per 10 shares and use additional paid-in capital to distribute 8 new shares for every 10 shares for 2017, to shareholders of record on May 9
* Says the companyâ€™s shares will be traded ex-right and ex-dividend on May 10 and the dividend will be paid on May 10
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/ThC3nk
 (Beijing Headline News)
